text: Irwin Keyes (March 16, 1952 – July 8, 2015) was an American actor and comedian, best known for his recurring role as Hugo on The Jeffersons. He appeared in several films and several television series. ==Early life== Keyes was born in New York City on March 16, 1952. ==Death== On July 8, 2015, Keyes died at the Playa Del Rey Center in Los Angeles, California of complications of acromegaly at age 63.Entertainment Weekly ==Filmography== * Team-Mates (1978) - Big Frank * Manny's Orphans (1978) - Shove * The Warriors (1979) - Police * Nocturna: Granddaughter of Dracula (1979) - Transylvania Character * Squeeze Play!
